text:
boxed.com | Edison, NJ or NYC | Full time | ONSITE | VISA transfer

Boxed is one of the fastest growing presences in eCommerce. At our core, however, we are truly a technology company that provides the best online wholesale experience.

We are a tech-driven team and utilize open software and hardware to solve real problems. We have lots of toys to play with, i.e.: raspberry pi, double robotics, irobot create 2, etc. Checkout our github (https://github.com/giddyinc) and apply from https://www.boxed.com/careers/?gh_jid=146428 if interested.
